## NFTModule.setDefaultSaleRecipient() method

Set the default primary sales recipient for this contract

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setDefaultSaleRecipient(recipient: string): Promise<TransactionReceipt>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  recipient | string | the wallet that should receive the proceeds from primary sales |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;TransactionReceipt&gt;
